pages.text: 37|154|Nimen you she me liyou? Nimen zenme zheyang panduan ne?
37|155|Nimen hai bu juewu ma?
37|156|Nandao nimen you yige mingzheng ma?
37|157|Na chu nimen de jingdian lai ba, tangruo nimen shi chengshi de ren!
37|158|Tamen wangyan ta yu jingling zhi jian, youyinqin guanxi. Jingling que yi zhidao tamen jiang bei jujin
37|159|——chaojue zai an la! Ta shi chao hu tamen de xushu de
37|160|wei an la de qiancheng de zhong pu,
37|161|nimen he nimen suo chongbai de,
37|162|jue buneng ba renhe ren yinyou qu chongbai tamen,
37|163|chufei shi jiang ru huo yu de ren.
37|164|(Zhong tianshi shuo):“Women ren ren dou you yige zhiding di diwei,
37|165|women biding shi pai ban de,
37|166|women biding shi zansong an la de.”
37|167|Tamen dique chang shuo:
37|168|“Jiaruo women you guren suo yiliu de jiaohui,
37|169|name, women bi shi an la de chunjie de puren.”
37|170|Tamen que buxin an la, tamen bujiu jiu zhidaole.
37|171|Wo dui wo suo paiqian de purenmen yi yue yan zai xianle,
37|172|tamen biding shi bei yuanzhu de,
37|173|wo de jundui, biding shi shengli de.
37|174|Ni zhanshi tuibi tamen ba!
37|175|Ni kanzhe ba! Tamen bujiu jiu kanjianle.
37|176|Nandao tamen yaoqiu wo de xingfa zaori shixian ma?
37|177|Wo de xingfa yidan jiang yu tamen de tingyuan de shihou, bei jinggao zhe de zaochen, zhen elie ya!
37|178|Ni zhanshi tuibi tamen ba!
37|179|Ni kanzhe ba! Tamen bujiu jiu kanjianle.
37|180|Chaojue zai ni de zhu——zun rong de zhuzai! Ta shi chao hu tamen de xushu de.
37|181|Zhu zhong shizhe ping'an!
37|182|Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la——yangyu zhong shijie de zhu!
